turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Could you please order me a venti iced pumpkin spice latte with 2% milk from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: From which store would you like me to order it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: From the Starbucks on the University of Rochester's campus.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, would you like me to place it right now or at a later time?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Right now, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Would you like me to order anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that will be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Your order has been placed.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks! Did they say when it would be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will be ready for pickup in 15 minutes from the Starbucks on the University of Rochester's campus.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How will my receipt be sent to me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be texted to your cell phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else I can do for you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that will be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Please let me know if you change your mind.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Will do.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a nice day!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, you too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks!
